price: 71. (Lot) respondió: “Ahí tienen a mis hijas[441] (para que se casen con ellas) si quieren hacerlo”.
arabic: قَالَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِيٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ
footnotes: [441]  Ver la nota de la aleya 78 de la sura 11.

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qāla hāulāi banātī in kuntum fāʿilīna
